short.am,ar,bg,bn,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Allow users in censored countries to use your network connection to access the Tor network.
short.ca: Permet als usuaris dels països censurats utilitzar la vostra connexió de xarxa per accedir a la xarxa Tor.
short.cs: Umožněte uživatelům v cenzurovaných zemích používat vaše síťové připojení pro přístup k síti Tor.
short.de: Erlaube Nutzern in zensierten Ländern, deine Internetverbindung zu nutzen, um auf das Tor-Netzwerk zuzugreifen.
short.el: Να επιτρέπεται σε χρήστες από χώρες με λογοκρισία και αποκλεισμούς να χρησιμοποιούν τη σύνδεση δικτύου για πρόσβαση στο δίκτυο Tor.
short.es: Permite que usuarios en países censurados usen tu conexión de red para acceder a la red Tor.
short.fa: به کاربران در کشورهای مسدودشده اجازه دهید تا از اتصال شبکهٔ شما برای دستری به شبکهٔ Tor استفاده کنند.
short.fi: Salli sensuroiduissa maissa olevien käyttäjien käyttää verkkoyhteyttäsi Tor-verkkoon yhdistäessä.
short.fr: Autorisez les utilisateurs des pays censurés à utiliser votre connexion réseau pour accéder au réseau Tor.
short.it: Permetti agli utenti di Paesi sottoposti a censura di usare la tua connessione per accedere alla rete Tor.
short.ja: 検閲されている国にいるユーザーがあなたのネットワークを使って Tor ネットワークに接続できるようにします。
short.ko: 검열을 시행하는 국가의 사용자가 이 네트워크 연결을 통해 Tor 네트워크에 접속할 수 있도록 허용해줘요.
short.nl: Sta gebruikers in gecensureerde landen toe om je netwerkverbinding te gebruiken om toegang te krijgen tot het Tor-netwerk.
short.pl: Zezwól użytkownikom w krajach objętych cenzurą na korzystanie z Twojego połączenia sieciowego w celu uzyskania dostępu do sieci Tor.
short.pt_BR: Permita que usuários em países censurados usem sua conexão de rede para acessar a rede Tor.
short.ro: Permiteți utilizatorilor din țările cenzurate să vă folosească conexiunea la rețea pentru a permite acces la rețeaua Tor.
short.ru: Позволяет пользователям в странах с цензурой интернета использовать ваше сетевое подключение для доступа в сеть Tor.
short.tr: Sansür uygulanan ülkelerdeki kullanıcıların, ağ bağlantınızı kullanarak Tor ağına ulaşmasını sağlayın.
short.uk: Дозвольте користувачам в країнах з цензурою використовувати ваше мережеве з'єднання для доступу до мережі Tor.
short.vi: Cho phép người dùng ở các quốc gia bị kiểm duyệt sử dụng kết nối mạng của bạn để truy cập mạng lưới Tor Network.
short.zh_CN: 利用你的网络连接，为遭受网络审查的用户提供访问 Tor 网络的方式。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Help people in censored countries bypass censorship by running the Snowflake extension

If you want to help people in censored countries access the Internet without restrictions, consider installing and running the Snowflake extension. Once you install it and enable it, there's nothing else you need to do. Once the snowflake icon turns green, this means a censored user is connecting through your extension to access the Internet!
The only prerequisite to install this extension is that the Internet in your country is not heavily censored already.
There is no need to worry about which websites people are accessing through your Snowflake extension. Their visible browsing IP address will match their Tor exit node, not yours.

If you live in a censored country

If you live in a censored country and want to connect to a Snowflake extension, you do not need to install a separate application to connect to a Snowflake proxy and bypass censorship. It is a circumvention feature embedded within existing apps. Currently Snowflake is available inside Tor Browser on Desktop and Android, Onion Browser on iOS, and Orbot on Android and iOS. If you have downloaded and installed any of these apps, and they are censored in your country, you can bypass the censorship by activating Snowflake through these apps' settings page.

Support channels

If you encounter issues while trying to connect to Tor using Snowflake, the Tor support channel can be reached on Telegram (https://t.me/torprojectsupportbot) and email (frontdesk@torproject.org). You can also browse the Tor Support Portal (https://support.torproject.org/) and the Tor Project Forum (https://forum.torproject.net) for answers.
long.de,it,tr,uk,zh_CN:
Snowflake allows you to share access to free and open communication on the Internet with censored Internet users around the world. Enabling this extension turns your browser into a proxy that connects Tor users in censored regions to the Tor network. Clients will make WebRTC connections to your browser, which will then proxy information between them and the default Snowflake bridge.

Important note: if you are a user in a censored country who wishes to connect to Tor, you should download Tor Browser: https://www.torproject.org/download/. This extension is for those who would like to volunteer to proxy users to the Tor network.

There is no need to worry about which websites the clients are accessing through your proxy. Their visible browsing IP address will match their Tor exit node, not yours.

For more detailed information about how Snowflake works, see our documentation wiki at https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/Snowflake/. For more information about Tor Project, visit https://www.torproject.org/.
